scripts.build: npm run build:library && npm run build:icon
scripts.make-pack: mkdir -p build && npm pack && mv rugo-vn-vue-* build/rugo-vn-vue.tgz
scripts.example:install: npm i && npm run build && npm run make-pack && cd example && npm i
scripts.example:clean: cd example && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.clean: rm -rf build && rm -rf dist && npm run example:clean
